# init()

**Initializer**

Returns a web extension controller initialized with the default configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Return Value

An initialized web extension controller, or nil if the object could not be initialized.

## Discussion

This is a designated initializer. You can use [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionController/init(configuration:)] to initialize an instance with a configuration.

## Related Documentation

- **init(configuration:)**: Returns a web extension controller initialized with the specified configuration.
